remarks: The set of neighborhoods of a subset of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
statement:
neifval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
neival $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) = { v e. ~P X | E. g e. J ( S C_ g /\ g C_ v ) } ) $.
$d J g v $.
$d S g v $.
$d X g v $.
